page.title: 03SHOPPING-EPPING GREEN
page.content: THE SURVEY REVEALED DEFINITE PATTERN OF SHOPPING HABITS.THE OLDER INHABITANTS TENDED TO USE THE ONE LOCAL SHOP ON A REGULAR BASIS,MOST MORE THAN TWICE A WEEK.BECAUSE OF THE DIFFICULTIES WITH LOCAL TRANSPORT,VISITS BY THE OLDER POPULATION WERE RESTRICTED TO INFREQUENT VISITS.HOWEVER,THE MAJORITY OF PEOPLE DID THEIR WEEKLY SHOPPING IN THREE MAIN AREAS-HARLOW(36.5%),EPPING(25.7%)AND HODDESTON(24.3%).MANY RESPONCES ALSO SHOWED A DISTINCT TENDENCY TO SHOP NEAR TO THEIR PLACE OF WORK,MAINLY IN AND AROUND LONDON.THE MAIN DIFFICULTIES ENCOUNTERED WERE THE ABSENCE OF A BUTCHERS AND A CHEMIST.MOST PEOPLE FELT THAT WHILE THEY HAD A CAR THEY WERE QUITE HAPPY ,BUT AGREED THAT WITHOUT ONE LIFE WAS DIFFICULT.
